d4a93e5a-8794-5168-9faa-60e087d7a11e.title: Each layer shall be keyed in to the layer above by means of a textured surface

95ee60d0-18b3-5430-aa91-a1b5cd16d67b.title: Acceptance Criteria - Fill material shall be spread and compacted in layers not exceeding 200mm compacted thickness. Layers with a compacted thickness >200mm may be placed subject to approval from the Superintendent.

1129c5ef-9224-5bd2-a372-12ad9482891a.title: Any rocky material present must be uniform throughout the layer.

69212a9b-dbdd-520e-8c4c-8fca82270d8d.title: Surface is smooth, hard, tightly bound and free from depressions which are capable of holding water Surface is not to be more than 15mm or less than 30mm from what is specificed in IFC drawings

44fd9381-6ef6-59eb-b8db-e357c3864538.title: Acceptance Criteria - The level tolerances at any point on the subgrade shall not lie more than 20 mm below a 3 m straightedge laid in any direction, except across a crown and water shall not pond at any point.

e1baa338-099f-5855-9b4a-e331c1461b39.title: Frequency - Prior to placement of next layer
